title: 有沒有人去過西伯利亞?

replies.msg: 可否分享旅遊經驗和照片？我知道一定好凍，零下幾十度，是否有很多西伯利亞雪橇犬😆😀?

My Japanese friend Keita is a marketing manager at Hilton. He uses photoshop every day as it’s worth its weight in gold in digital marketing. The party poster he designed is fabulous. The good words are sharply defined on the black background. I admire his ambition and fierce determination to succeed. He never gets sidetracked by unimportant issues. In addition he enjoys debates. Last week he wiped the floor with all opposition during a debate about the existence of god. It felt very impressive. His elder sister is an insurance agent who gets a basic salary of eight thousand per month plus a twenty percent commission on the deals she makes so she doesn’t work by commission only. She said she’d be out on strike but she turned out to be joking as her dad is an intense patriot. If she had gone on strike her dad wouldn’t have been happy lol I enjoy chatting with her but whenever we chat 💭 we never seem to progress beyond kickboxing. Keira’s great great grandfather 👴🏻 was a violinist during the romantic period. He started with performing in salons and then progressed to big concert halls.
你夏天去咪熱囉 自己check 天氣啦
冬天去著夠衫其實感覺同係香港差唔多
